articles.title: South Africa cruise to clean sweep - SuperSport
articles.description: South Africa barely raised a sweat as Quinton de Kock and Reeza Hendricks struck fluent undefeated half-centuries to knock off a modest 121 for victory to complete a rare 10-wicket victory.
